params.duration: Duration in seconds until the market deadline
params.question: The question to be resolved

returns.marketId: The ID of the newly created market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.marketId: The market to request resolution for

params.dimScores: Packed array: 3 scores per worker (resQuality, srcQuality, analysisDepth), each 0-100
params.weights: Array of reward weights per worker

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createMarket(string,uint256).notice: Create a new market with a question and reward pool

joinMarket(uint256).notice: Join an active market as a worker by staking ETH

requestResolution(uint256).notice: Request resolution for a market, emitting an event for CRE EVM Log Trigger

resolveMarket(uint256,address[],uint256[.notice: Resolve a market and distribute rewards to workers

setAuthorizedResolver(address,bool).notice: Set or revoke an authorized resolver
